actionfx-core
  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAFXApplication
    Base class for ActionFX applications that can be optionally used.
    AbstractAnnotatedFieldControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Controller extension base class that extends annotated fields.
    AbstractAnnotatedMethodControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Controller extension base class that extends annotated methods.
    AbstractAnnotatedMethodControllerExtension.OrderBasedAnnotatedMethodComparator<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Comparator implementation that orders methods according to the "order" attribute among same controls.
    AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​E extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement>
    Base class for controller extensions that apply a logic to controller fields and methods that are marked with annotations.
    AbstractInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Base class for specialized Supplier implementation that take care of the instantiation of an ActionFX component (controller, view, etc.).
    AbstractView
    Abstract base class for view implementations.
    ActionFX
    Central handler for working with ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXBuilder
    Builder for setting up the singleton instance of ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXState
    Enumeration describing the state of ActionFX.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer
    Byte-code enhancer using the ByteBuddy framework.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer.AFXActionMethodInterceptorDelegator
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    ActionFXEnhancer
    Interface for byte code enhancer.
    ActionFXEnhancer.EnhancementStrategy
    Defines available enhancement strategies for ActionFX.
    AFXActionMethodInterceptor
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    AFXApplication
    Annotation that can be applied to the main class of an ActionFX application for configuring it.
    AFXArgHint
    Annotation to apply "hints" to method arguments.
    AFXCellValueConfig
    Annotation that can be applied at field level to configure tables/table columns and what data shall be displayed there and how.
    AFXCellValueConfig.AFXTableColumns
    Annotation to make AFXCellValueConfig repeatable (e.g. on TableView and TreeTableView directly).
    AFXController
    Annotation for ActionFX controllers to associate and manage a view together with it.
    AFXControlValue
    Annotation to be applied to method arguments to retrieve the user value from the specified control.
    AFXConverter
    Annotation that can be applied at field level to add a converter to a control.
    AFXEnableMultiSelection
    Annotation that can be applied at field level on a Control, in order to enable a multi-selection on that annotated control.
    AFXLoadControlData
    Annotated methods are returning the data that is displayed in referenced Controls.
    AFXNestedView
    Repeatable annotation to define a nested view.
    AFXNestedView.AFXNestedViews
    Annotation to make AFXNestedView repeatable.
    AFXOnAction
    Annotated methods are invoked when the control specified with fires ActionEvent.
    AFXOnControlValueChange
    Annotated methods are invoked when the user changes a value in the referenced control identified by {@link #controlId()).

    Annotated methods can be of the following signature:

    For controls with a single-value:

    • void methodName()
    • void methodName(TYPE newValue) void methodName(TYPE newValue, TYPE oldValue, ObservableValue<TYPE> observableValue)
    AFXShowView
    Annotation to be applied at method level that allows to define which view to be displayed after successful method invocation.
    AFXUseFilteredList
    Annotation that can be applied at field level on a Control, so that ActionFX instructs the control to use a FilteredList as items.
    AFXUtils
    Util-class for working with JavaFX.
    AnnotationUtils
    Utils class for working with annotations.
    ArgumentHint
    A hint for a method parameter that can help in case two different method parameters have the same type.
    AsyncUtils
    Utils for performing tasks in an asynchronous fashion.
    BeanContainerFacade
    Facade for accessing a bean container holding necessary view and controller instances.
    BorderPanePosition
    Describes the position in a BorderPane.
    CellValueConfigControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXCellValueConfig annotation.
    ClassPathScanningUtils
    Utils for scanning the classpath.
    ConstructorBasedInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier that uses defined constructors of given class.
    ControllerExtensionBean
    Bean that carries all custom controller extensions added by the user during ActionFX startup.
    ControllerInstancePostProcessor
    Post-processor for controller instances that is invoked after view creation and dependency injection, but before potential @PostConstruct-annotated methods.
    ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier for controller instances.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter
    Adapter for invoking controller methods with variable method arguments.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue
    A representation of a method parameter, together with a ParameterHint
    ControllerWrapper<T>
    Wrapper class around a JavaFX controller that is enhanced either with an instrumentation agent or via sub-classing.
    ControlWrapper
    Wrapper around a Control in order to have a unique access to its values.
    ConverterControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXConverter annotation.
    DefaultBeanContainer
    Default implementation of a bean container using an underlying hash map as bean cache.
    DialogController
    Controller for working with simple dialogs like confirmation-, information-, warning-, error-, file handling- and text input dialogs.
    EnableMultiSelectionControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXNestedView annotation.
    ExceptionUtils
    Utils for working with exceptions in ActionFX.
    FxmlView
    View implementation that uses FXML for describing the view.
    NestedViewControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXNestedView annotation.
    NodeVisitor
    Functional handler for applying some logic during scene graph traversal.
    NodeWrapper
    Wrapper around a Node (or other objects inside a scene graph, e.g.
    NodeWrapper.AnchorPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node inside an AnchorPane.
    NodeWrapper.BorderPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node in a BorderPane.
    NodeWrapper.ColRowAttacher
    Specialized attacher for GridPane nodes, where the node can be attached at a specified column and row.
    NodeWrapper.DefaultAttacher
    Simple attacher that supports single child wrapper like ScrollPane (and its content property) as well as node derived from Parent.
    NodeWrapper.ListAttacher
    Attaches a node to a list at a specified position.
    NodeWrapper.ListFirstAttacher
    Attaches a node as first element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.ListLastAttacher
    Attaches a node as last element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.NodeAttacher
    Interface for attaching a node to the node wrapper's children at a specified position.
    ObservableListAdapter<E>
    Adapter class for populating values in an ObservableList.
    ObservableListSelectionModel<T>
    Wrapper for an ObservableList to access the items of this list as a SelectionModel.
    OnActionMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXOnAction annotation.
    OnControlValueChangeMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXOnControlValueChange annotation.
    OnLoadControlDataMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXLoadControlData annotation.
    ParentView
    View implementation that is based on a class derived from Parent.
    ReflectionUtils
    Utils for handling reflections.
    ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter fields to be operated on by a field callback.
    ReflectionUtils.MethodFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter methods to be operated on by a method callback.
    TimedChangeListener<T>
    Implementation of the ChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    TimedListChangeListener<T>
    Implementation of the ListChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    UseFilteredListControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXUseFilteredList annotation.
    ValueChangeAwareObservableList<E>
    Special implementation of ObservableList that is aware when values of list elements are changing.
    ValueChangeAwareObservableList.SingleValueChange<E>
    Implementation of ListChangeListener.Change that represents a "list change", when values of the list are updated.
    View
    Interface for JavaFX views.
    ViewBuilder<T extends AbstractView>
    Builder for setting up instances derived from AbstractView.
